name: Tara Flowers
text: They still have beautiful flowers for sale. Very few Bonnie plants. They also have plenty of seeds but if you are looking for collards or turnips look elsewhere.

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Looking for great plants for your garden this summer?  Home Depot at Crestwood Festival Center even has heirloom varieties of tomato plants you will not find other places.

name: C Taylor
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. I have been here often. I actually pass up another improvement store to come to this one. Always have what I need and if they don't they will direct me where to go. The first time I came to this store was when we first moved to an area 35 miles from this store. I needed a Christmas tree. The Christmas trees were having a tuff year because of the drought. They replace the tree with a bigger one because I had to drive so far to come back. Super nice folks. I will continue to drive here for my home improvement needs.

name: Tracy Wyatt
text: Helpful people wonderful place to shop and they care about vets only one thing i have a promblem with is the garden center their plants are not taken care of and the empl oyees are familar with plants.

name: Mark Singleton
text: Found everything I needed except hosta plants

name: Shahari Pierce
text: They always have a great selection of plants and flowers. The deals aren't bad. I do wish they would take better care of the clearance section. When I go, a lot of them are usually knocked over and in dire need of water.

name: Maxine Bailey
text: Nice plants, plenty of seeds on display. Didn't find fingerling potatoes. Guess their spring supply of flowers will be in soon.

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text: They not only did not have what i wanted in stock. but they also had a sales agent in the garden center who absolutely had no knowledge about plants whatsoever. Nor was she willing to get off of her lazy ass to help a customer look either. She just sat there at the register and pointed to a section where she think it might be and began to say how they had them last week but dont know what is or isnt there now. Im like: uhh but you work here and you dont know what you have in stock of the main area where you work..smh

name: Teresa Davis
text: Great place to shop excellent customer service

name: Mary Reese
text: Nice, good prices

name: jamacia rudolph
text: Awesome flowers

name: Samantha Hopkins
text: Going inside  the gardening center my first impression  was  the plants on the outside were not listed properly, several  perennial were under annuals and one plant had a arm of ants in it, next the stepping stones were very limited, I was looking for the octagon shaped one no luck, and the two hump barrier stone for flower beds were only in red which is disappointing, some of the plants were a little high considering the condition, also I'd love to know the name of some that happen to be in a planter assortment, left  me wondering.  I didn't like that some were very little detail on the information label but we do have Google  so I can't  complain too much. The cashiers seem to runaway if a customer comes to pay it was very unprofessional and also a waste of my time having to go find both cashiers "helping" customer, one literally was just watching.

name: Kyndall Reynolds
text: The garden center attendant was very knowledgeable of the products and helpful in us choosing a zero turn mower, bagger, and tiller.

name: Barry “Baw” Williams Sr.
text: Awesome!very helpful workers who can help you and know what they talking about too!

name: SandiB
text: Bought a new lawn mower on sale. Was $249 on sale for $186. Troybilt

name: Lora Benson
text:
Cashier was very courteous to her own kind.
Let some guy that just walked up go before me in line. Never ask how I was today like the other patrons whom she had full conversation with. But I did ask her how she was. No-one to help load or unload. All common for this location. Makes you want to drive 10 miles out of the way to Lowes.

name: Juanvinetta Elliott
text: Didn't  have everything I needed but I did get somethings

name: Paul Burnette
text: They didn't have the part that I was trying to find.....

name: Robert Turner Sr
text: Everything were nice and clean. Everyone we're frendly, speaking, wanting to help.as usually. Thanks.

name: elonzo taylor
text: Very neat...found what I was looking for with no problem.

name: Steven Dillon
text: Had what I needed and great price

name: Ron Terry
text: Nice place to visit

name: ohms0704
text: Good

name: Mollie Newsome
text: I like this place because it's a garden Center! I love to be around growing things. The staff are very helpful and seem to know what they're talking about.

name: Arlene Dean
text:
We have shopped here several times & have found what we needed nearly every time. Most recently a gentleman helped us in the plumbing department & knew more about the issue we were having than the so called plumber we hired (that came to our home twice & still didn't fix the issue).
The water refill tube the Home Depot employee opened for us to test, and sold to us, fit perfectly & solved our problem.
We also purchased our holiday tree & holiday greenery at this location.  Nick, the helpful young man that trimmed & wrapped the tree for us, did a perfect job. We have lived in a variety of cities and states and this is hands down our favorite Home Depot location.

name: Scamuel Jones
text: This place is a total loser.  I could not find two common plants I was looking for in the lawn & garden.  Then I clicked to "chat" and was told I was #1 in the queue and then no one ever chatted!  I would suggest not even wasting your time at Home Depot for anything.  Try Lowe's or local nurseries, since these people totally IGNORE their customers!

name: Mason
text: Helpful staff but they often don't have what I'm looking for.

name: Amy Clement
text:
I live just down the street from this Home Depot and EVERY time I go into this store, I can never find anyone to help me.  It looks like a ghost town at the front of the store.  Are you under staffing this store, or are the employees hiding in the back?  I will say that I mostly come to this store after 5pm usually.

I thought it was important to let you know this because if things do not improve, I will just go across the street to Lowe's where they have always been more than happy to help me.  Your store is my neighborhood store, and I want to see you succeed and not go under because of poor management decisions with either hiring bad employees or not paying your staff enough to care about the customers.

Thanks!

name: T Denton
text: I purchased garden soil for blueberry plants.

name: Monika Askew
text: Had to load 40 bags of mulch by myself.  I told the cashier I would need help but he didn't call anyone.  Meanwhile, there were 2 guys loading pine straw and didn't offer to help.

name: Timothy Taylor
text: My wife and I were looking for something to replace the old plastic edging around our flower beds and some fresh soil to work into the beds. No problems there. We got ready to check out, and Home Depot decided to do their best Walmart impression...9 or 10 customers waiting to check out, only 1 register open.😖  After about 12-15 minutes in line, the second register finally opened.

name: Diane Lewis
text: Love the garden center, beautiful flowers they had a sale on potting soil, good deal but no one there to help I have a bad hand and needed help with soil but couldn't find any one

name: Bobby Gilliland
text: very good in every way.

name: Bryan McElroy
text: Home and garden building supplies tools.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Fantastic experience. Super helpful guy (and beautiful resident black cat) who exchanged, without problem, a plant I bought a few weeks ago that perished. Much more room than some garden centers, making it easy to get around with wide aisles. Lots of variety in annuals and perrenial plants and all the rest, pots, rocks, soil and anything for outside. Wish they would keep the garden center gates open when the store is open for that last hour shopping errand.

name: Jared Persons
text:
Just purchased a big grille!!!!
Home depot employee from lighting DEPT , stopped what he was doing to help me wheel grille to register and then outside to my trailer to help load it up.
He could of easily sent me on a wild goose chase to find someone in the lawn and garden section, but he didn't.....That's hard to find these days in retail stores...

name: Bit Bucket
text: It was good for us today! Because of the freezing weather, herbs were knocked down to 3 bucks. Some of them were not hurt.

name: lovesickforone
text: Loved thier garden dpt.! Great plants...good variety

name: Christopher Brown
text: Drove from Bayou la Batre they had only part of what I needed but they just out. Big selling I belive

name: Judith Word
text: The garden department staff & all employees and management here have been very friendly and helpful

name: Russell Pilling
text: I live in Theodore and went to Lowe's first waited forty minutes to be told by the man in lawn and garden he would be there soon waiting for another fifteen minutes went to Home Depot got a riding mower and gone in fifteen minutes that's faster than Jimmy Johnson LOLOL

name: hector macias
text: ,,love shopping here everytime a make a delivery,,

name: Diana Kritinar
text: They have SO many beautiful plants, wood furniture - gliders, rocking chairs, swings, the smoked chicken was absolutely delicious, as was the berry chicken salad, they have keto options, sweets, bread, I just love this place!

name: Shaleigh Miller
text: One of the best experiences I’ve had. Amazing product variety & the people were fantastic! Definitely will be back.

name: Larry Jacobs
text: Great produce love their ribs .staff is friendly an very helpful. On the down side the man that makes the flowers sold our grave flowers sold our order to someone else he wasn’t very nice. Rick an his brother are the best.I recommend everyone shop and to support this local business.

name: Jo Larson
text: Super nice folks.  Parking was a bit crowded bit that's because the place is popular. All the produce seemed fresh.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: I love Rick's Produce! The staff is amazing and their produce is so fresh and great and so are their plants. The tomatoes are definitely a fave for my fam!

name: Rick Slade
text: Great experience! Very nice facility! Outstanding staff! Can't wait to go back!

name: Michael R Ballard
text: Excellent choices...fresh produce...great BBQ...homemade soups are the best...garden shop and wood furniture availabl...always friendly and willing to help

name: Teresa Robinson
text: I love this place. Friendly people and great produce. Best place around.

name: Beverly Davis
text: Love Rick's!! Got some beautiful palm trees and flowers and the best ribs ever today!!

name: george williams
text:
This market is clean, well stocked, staff is knowledgeable & hospitable, fresh veggies galore & great variety of fruit as well...awesome place to score groceries 👌 Also lots of jams, jellies, honey, sauces and other goodies. Meats, casseroles & plenty of sweet tooth treats.
My wife scored a bounty of vegetables and a bunch of scupernongs & I brought home a beautiful cedar porch swing.
We will be returning anytime we are close by 😊

name: David Martin
text: Friendly folks with great products.

name: anthony givens
text: Its a pretty neat place to shop. They should encourage mask wearing till we get thru this virus thing.

name: Eric Malone
text: Great place to shop really nice layout and the customer service is great

name: Donna Patterson
text:
Ricks is awesome. Freshest of vegetables, and fruits. Love it all.
Added to say, the meats are so good. The Boston butts are a family favorite .The bologna is great. I also purchased all the flowers for graveside decoration at Ricks this year. If you have not been there! What are you waiting on? It is an awesome place to shop for fresh veggies and just about any thing you want.  Thanks Rick we could not survive without you! ❤

name: Maria Gholston
text: First time stopping by today... The staff and owner (Rick) are very hospitable and friendly.  True exame.of "Southern Hospitality". Will definitely be back.

name: Lindsey Hanna
text: Everything looked super clean and lovely, even the bathroom! The veggies looked amazing and the section of jams and pickles was great.

name: Big Hand Dave
text: Great produce!!!  Someone is always ready to help however needed and i am always greeted with smiles.

name: Reagan Boyles
text: Lots of inventory, good prices, staff is helpful and friendly. Flowers, pumpkins, mums, cornhole game boards, lots of good stuff here.

name: Phillip James
text: Great. Smoked meats and good variety of other things.

name: jake and bake
text: We loved the chairs they had. Very friendly people. A little high on the produce but they have some beautiful produce.

name: Bootsie Lewis
text: I have been a customer of Ricks Produce since they opened years ago! Truly love the fresh fruit, peaches, can't get enough of them. If you haven't tried some of the jams, hot sauces or the salsa you should!!

name: Roger Coats
text: Good variety of different items

name: Amberia Spiller
text: Best place to get fresh fruits and vegetables. The smoked meats taste amazing. The staff are friendly and extremely helpful.

name: Tyler Oliver
text: Great selection of produce as well as other food products (bacon, sausage, hamburger meat). Try the Mama Cole's fried pies! Great customer service as well.

name: Summer Trapp
text: Always love the fresh quality vegetable from Rick's each year. Today was my first stop of the season and I was thrilled to find that they now carry all my fave Dutch Oven goodies.

name: Guitardude4hire
text: Very pleased with my visit. Freindly helpful staff. Fair prices.. I'll definitely be back..

name: Sheri Eagerton
text: It was great  the meals  are very  good.

name: Jenn Adams
text: Always amazing service and product!  Tons of great fall decor and pumpkins!

name: Michael Geib
text: Great fresh fruits and veggies

name: David Rhodes
text: Top notch friendliness from all the their employees. They have a great selection of produce, unique and delicious desserts, and all kinds of nice things. Stop by and check it out.

name: Diane Faust
text: The freshest fruit and vegetables you will find...straight out of the garden....don't forget the ribs...fresh smoked meat also...😁

name: A N Bar
text: Tons of produce and homemade breads and candy! Great place to shop

name: ML Howell
text: Beautiful plants and flowers

name: Nina Coats
text: Easy to find things. Friendly service.

name: chelsie keeton
text: Always my favorite place to get my produce! Lots of great local produce and products sold here!

name: Laurie Nave
text: Great selection, fair prices, local honey, friendly owners

name: Kathy Baggett
text: Great vegetables, great selection and very friendly staff.  We love Rick’s!

name: Jerry Brackin
text: The ribs awesome the white sauce we loved it better than a restaurant wow we will be back

name: Kathy Baggett
text: Great vegetables, great selection and very friendly staff.  We love Rick’s!

name: Jerry Brackin
text: The ribs awesome the white sauce we loved it better than a restaurant wow we will be back

name: Brenda Lindsey
text: This place is awesome!  Ribs and Boston butt are delicious 👌😋

name: Jennifer Watson
text: Roasted corn was delicious! The orange lemonade was light and refreshing!

name: KT PHOTOS
text: I'm from out of state and a lady suggested to come here. So I drove 45 min for rude and u professional service. Never again ill spend my money else where.

name: Owens8
text: People NOT social distancing. Employees not wearing masks or gloves. Customers bringing dogs inside! Overpriced for grocery store produce. Take your hard earned money to Publix

name: Matt Posey
text: Nice place...little pricey...but otherwise good stuff

name: Anita Parker
text: great place, I am excited to try new items in salads

name: BigBen 076
text: Rick’s Produce is the place to go in the shoals! Great produce, meats, flowers and more with a  friendly staff. Support local businesses!!!!

name: Kala Mccaig
text: Always great service there. Prices are comparable to local markets.

name: Linda Crews
text: Nice

name: Tracy Robinson
text: Great place..ilove it!

name: Sherry Lockhart
text: Great produce... wonderful strawberries!!

name: Dorothy Anglin
text: Ricks is the best and friendly

name: Christie Garner
text: Rocks is amazing! Never buy produce in the spring and summer anywhere else! The most fresh fruits and vegetables anywhere!And they are so very helpful

name: gregory tenpas
text: A must to shop and visit. Fresh fruits and vegetables. Outdoor furniture and plants. Great staff , reasonable pricing.

name: Jennifer Dolehite
text: Corner of the road produce, jams, pumpkins, Indian corn, wooden chairs, refrigerated goods and more.  Totally stocked and expanding every time we visit.  Fair pricing.  Good people.

name: Bryant Mauldin
text: Wonderful place with a great staff. Make you feel at home. While carrying some of the Best available Products in the SHOALS

name: Eric Robert
text: Pricey

name: Tim Palmer
text: Great selection and customer service!

name: Dennis Phillips
text: Great produce and friendly staff

name: Amy Allen
text: Always great product and great people.  Highly reccomend.

name: Linda Smothermon
text: Great produce. Knew the strawberries were fresh because I could smell them when I walked up.

name: Edgar Ferrell
text: Everyone treats you like family....

name: Melinda Wynn
text: Love It!  Great produce early in the year. Great tomatoes!

name: Robin Featherston
text: Loved the variety but it's a little pricey. I still bought some good home grown veggies tho!

name: William Lux
text: This is our go-to place for vegetables locally. Rick and his crew are knowledgeable and great to deal with.

name: Wanda Sherer
text: This is the best produce stand around.  The people are wonderful and the produce is delicious.

name: Mike Gean
text: It is the best place to buy produce Rick is a really good person that knows his produce very well and an honest man

name: Lynn Brewer
text: Good veggies but overcharges. Takes items off the scales before it shows correct weight. I weighed items at home and was overcharged approximately $1.

name: Susan Jones
text: I love going to Rick's produce they are always so helpful and knowledgeable!

name: Brad McGuire
text: Awesome fruit and vegetables! Best flavor and prices in NW Alabama!

name: Wanda Sherer
text: This is the best produce stand around.  The people are wonderful and the produce is delicious.

name: mya kissinger
text: Love all the variety they have. Will be back again soon .

name: Paula Jo Scott King
text: Lots of good fresh produce also alot of hand crafted furniture and goods.

name: Nathan Graham
text: They had a lot of items that aren't available other places. Prices were fair and great variety to select from.

name: Tracy Biggers
text: They are always so helpful and friendly. The flowers and produce are always fresh.

name: Dustin Coan
text: This is only a seasonal place but they have great produce! Check the Facebook page as they also carry a lot of other cool farm to table related things!

name: Dendy Lester
text: Drove all the way from Petersvile to those great tomatoes Cherokee  purple love going to ricks

name: Scott Mason
text: Great Local Business To Get Your Fresh Fruits , Vegetables And Garden Plants !

name: Tonya Hawkins
text: Delicious produce , great price, and friendly service.

name: Frede Frazier
text: The produce is amazing. People there are super nice.

name: Cindy Gamble
text: Love Rick's, best place around. So much to choose from.

name: Justin Proctor
text: Amazing selection of fresh fruits and vegetables, with the amazing staff!

name: Sonya White
text: Nice place but prices are a little steep!

name: brandon tolbert
text: The best place to buy fresh vegs and fruits, and the staff is great!!!!

name: Mike Diggs
text: They have anything you want and it's fresh!

name: Crystal Lovell
text: The very best place to get all veggies, flowers etc. Every one there is so sweet kind and very helpful. If you haven't been it's a must go.

name: Christine McClantoc
text: Good variety but expensive

name: Jason Pace
text: Great veggies & fruit good prices too

name: Lee Mcdonald
text: They always have the freshest produce in town.

name: Susan Arlene Moore

name: marcus newsome
text: Love this place

name: David Waldrep
text: Very nice will be going back

name: Mary Stanfield (Darla Starr)

name: Louise Hester
text: Friendly.  Great produce.

name: Darla Letsinger
text: Everybody was out of pumpkins Walmart close last day the day of Halloween so I stopped by Rick's not only did you have a bunch but because it was the last day I were a dollar piece I was so satisfied with the service and a product and of course especially the price but I found a place to come for all my produce!!

name: Kassondra Baylis
text: Fresh and amazing prices

name: Jerry Wilson
text: Carried my large water melon to the end of the lot for us...

text: Love it best place to get fresh produce

name: Donna Robbins

name: Sherry Roberts
text: Rick and Kevin are special guy we are blessed to have them in our little town and all the rest of those sweet folks bless you all
